languages.text: "Из жерла святыни вышли несколько тысяч человек и на архаической версии Низкого Готического потребовали дать им распоряжения. Они послушно возделывают землю, строят жилища и производственные комплексы и в целом обладают поразительно широким набором навыков и знаний. Однако, судя по всему, эти люди напрочь лишены собственной воли — за это монахи прозвали их Блаженными".

"From the mouth of the relic came several thousand people who, speaking an archaic form of Low Gothic, demanded to be given orders. They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and, in general, have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."
languages.original_text: "Из жерла святыни вышли несколько тысяч человек и на архаической версии Низкого Готического потребовали дать им распоряжения. Они послушно возделывают землю, строят жилища и производственные комплексы и в целом обладают поразительно широким набором навыков и знаний. Однако, судя по всему, эти люди напрочь лишены собственной воли — за это монахи прозвали их Блаженными".

traits.locale_text: "From the mouth of the relic came several thousand people and, speaking the archaic version of Low Gothic, demanded to give them orders. They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge in general. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Blessed."

They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge in general. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Blessed."

They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and, in general, have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."

However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."

They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and, in general, have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."

They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and, in general, have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."

languages.text: “有几千人从遗物的巨口中走了出来。他们说着某种古老的低哥特语，请求得到命令。他们以顺从的态度耕种土地，建造房屋与生产设施。总体而言，他们拥有各种各样的非凡技能与知识，但似乎却完全没有自主意志。为此，修士们称他们为‘受召者’。”
languages.original_text: "From the mouth of the relic came several thousand people who, speaking an archaic form of Low Gothic, demanded to be given orders. They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and, in general, have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."

traits.locale_text: “有几千人从遗物的巨口中走了出来。他们说着某种古老的低哥特语，请求得到命令。他们以顺从的态度耕种土地，建造房屋与生产设施。总体而言，他们拥有各种各样的非凡技能与知识，但似乎却完全没有自主意志。为此，修士们称他们为‘受召者’。”

languages.text: «De la boca de la reliquia salieron varios miles de personas que, hablando una forma arcaica de bajo gótico, exigían que se les dieran órdenes. Cultivan la tierra, construyen casas e instalaciones de producción con obediencia y, en general, poseen un notable abanico de habilidades y conocimientos. Sin embargo, parece que estas personas carecen por completo de libre albedrío y, por ello, los monjes les han dado el nombre de Tocados».
languages.original_text: "From the mouth of the relic came several thousand people who, speaking an archaic form of Low Gothic, demanded to be given orders. They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and, in general, have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."

traits.locale_text: «De la boca de la reliquia salieron varios miles de personas que, hablando una forma arcaica de bajo gótico, exigían que se les dieran órdenes. Cultivan la tierra, construyen casas e instalaciones de producción con obediencia y, en general, poseen un notable abanico de habilidades y conocimientos. Sin embargo, parece que estas personas carecen por completo de libre albedrío y, por ello, los monjes les han dado el nombre de Tocados».

languages.text: 「聖遺物の入り口から数千人の人々が現れ、廃れてしまった下位帝国語を話しながら、命令を与えてくれと要求していました。彼らは土地を耕し、住居や生産施設を従順に建設し、概して驚くほど広範な技術と知識を有しています。ただ、どうやら彼らには自由意志が一切ないようで、修道士は彼らのことを触れられし者と呼ぶようになったのです」
languages.original_text: "From the mouth of the relic came several thousand people who, speaking an archaic form of Low Gothic, demanded to be given orders. They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and, in general, have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."

traits.locale_text: 「聖遺物の入り口から数千人の人々が現れ、廃れてしまった下位帝国語を話しながら、命令を与えてくれと要求していました。彼らは土地を耕し、住居や生産施設を従順に建設し、概して驚くほど広範な技術と知識を有しています。ただ、どうやら彼らには自由意志が一切ないようで、修道士は彼らのことを触れられし者と呼ぶようになったのです」

languages.text: « Plusieurs milliers d'individus sont sortis de la bouche de la relique et, s'exprimant dans une forme archaïque de bas gothique, ont immédiatement demandé quels étaient leurs ordres. Ils cultivent la terre, érigent des maisons et bâtissent des usines avec une obéissance aveugle, et ils disposent pour la plupart d'un remarquable éventail de compétences et de savoirs. Toutefois, ces êtres semblent totalement dépourvus de libre arbitre, ce qui a amené les moines à les nommer "les Altérés". »
languages.original_text: "From the mouth of the relic came several thousand people who, speaking an archaic form of Low Gothic, demanded to be given orders. They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and, in general, have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."

traits.locale_text: « Plusieurs milliers d'individus sont sortis de la bouche de la relique et, s'exprimant dans une forme archaïque de bas gothique, ont immédiatement demandé quels étaient leurs ordres. Ils cultivent la terre, érigent des maisons et bâtissent des usines avec une obéissance aveugle, et ils disposent pour la plupart d'un remarquable éventail de compétences et de savoirs. Toutefois, ces êtres semblent totalement dépourvus de libre arbitre, ce qui a amené les moines à les nommer "les Altérés". »

languages.text: "Aus dem Mund des Relikts kamen mehrere tausend Personen, die in einer uralten Form des Niedergotischen verlangten, Befehle zu erhalten. Gehorsam kultivieren sie Land, bauen Häuser und Produktionsanlagen. Es ist erstaunlich, wie vielseitig ihre Fähigkeiten und ihr Wissen sind. Es scheint aber, als würden diese Personen keinerlei freien Willen besitzen, weshalb die Mönche sie die Berührten genannt haben."
languages.original_text: "From the mouth of the relic came several thousand people who, speaking an archaic form of Low Gothic, demanded to be given orders. They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and, in general, have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."

traits.locale_text: "Aus dem Mund des Relikts kamen mehrere tausend Personen, die in einer uralten Form des Niedergotischen verlangten, Befehle zu erhalten. Gehorsam kultivieren sie Land, bauen Häuser und Produktionsanlagen. Es ist erstaunlich, wie vielseitig ihre Fähigkeiten und ihr Wissen sind. Es scheint aber, als würden diese Personen keinerlei freien Willen besitzen, weshalb die Mönche sie die Berührten genannt haben."

languages.text: "Yadigârın ağzından eski bir Adi Gotik lehçesini konuşan binlerce insan çıkıp geldi. Kendilerine emir verilmesini talep ediyorlar. İtaaatkârlıkla toprağı işliyor, evler ve üretim tesisleri inşa ediyorlar. Genel olarak etkileyici derecede yetenek ve irfan sahibi insanlar. Ancak bu insanlar, özgür iradeden tamamen yoksun görünüyorlar. Bundandır ki keşişler, onlara Mütehassis adını verdiler."
languages.original_text: "From the mouth of the relic came several thousand people who, speaking an archaic form of Low Gothic, demanded to be given orders. They cultivate land, build houses and production facilities with obedience and, in general, have a remarkable range of skills and knowledge. However, it seems that these people completely lack their own free will, and for this, the monks have named them Touched."
